verbose_text: In the present study, to clarify the anti-tumor mechanisms of cetuximab, we evaluated the KRAS / BRAF status, phosphorylation level of the EGFR pathway, and the tumor suppression effect in vivo, using a human colon cancer cell line HT29, which exhibited the highest EGFR expression in response to the cetuximab therapy among the 6 colorectal cancer cell lines tested.
